thread.title: Savaged global stocks head for worst week since 2011

title: Savaged global stocks head for worst week since 2011
text:
Savaged global stocks head for worst week since 2011 Friday, February 09, 2018 - 01:41 
A four percent drop in Chinese shares dealt reeling world stock markets a fresh blow on Friday, as nerves about rising borrowing costs and soaring volatility put them on course for their worst week since the height of euro zone crisis. Ivor Bennett reports.
